item.title: Natural-gas futures are surging again, even after last week’s historic surge
item.description: Natural-gas prices are off to another blistering start on Monday as a bitter winter storm leaves thousands without power.

item.title: Why a private-credit fund tied to BlackRock is getting hammered
item.description: A private credit fund tied to the world’s largest asset manager was getting hit hard in premarket trade after revealing its net asset value will be ma...

item.title: ‘I‘m facing an ethical dilemma’: My widowed mother is cutting my step siblings out of the family trust. Do I have an ethical responsibility?
item.description: “My mother has now hired an attorney to revise the trust and remove her late husband’s children as beneficiaries.”

item.title: My husband’s kids didn’t even show up for his heart surgery. So why is he leaving them his $1 million life insurance?
item.description: “Both of us were widowed. We are in our late 60s and retired.”

item.title: Bets on a U.S. government shutdown spike after latest civilian death in Minnesota
item.description: Bets on a government shutdown happening by Jan. 31 are now at 78%, spiking over the weekend following another civilian death in Minnesota.
